description:
"I love this course from beginning to end. I just couldn't stop with the lessons flowing one after the other. This is an integral course that reveals a lot of techniques to tap into inner wisdom. Highly recommended." Cindylu Figueroa

************************************************************************

Do you want to become more intuitive and achieve overall more success in life?

This is a certification course about improving your intuition with dowsing and kinesiology (muscle testing). This course is for people from all walks of life. Whether you're in business, a consultant, healer or coach, this course can help you make choices quicker, more efficient and with certainty, accuracy and confidence!

************************************************************************

“There is no logical way to the discovery of these elemental laws. There is only the way of intuition, which is helped by a feeling for the order lying behind the appearance."

Albert Einstein

************************************************************************

–Do you want to learn how to become a human lie detector?

–Is the person you're dating is right for you?

–Or maybe you need to hire staff and you wish you had a crystal ball?

–Should I ask for a raise or quit my job and start my own company?

The dowsing techniques you will learn here will help you get accurate answers to all of your questions.

This certification course will teach you how to fine tune your intuition by means of using dowsing tools as well as just using your body (intuitive kinesiology).

************************************************************************

You will learn how to use dowsing tools, such as a pendulum, as well as just using your body (muscle testing) to read signals your intuitive self is continually sending you.

Here are the topics this course will cover:

–History of Dowsing – an 8,000 year old tradition

–What is the Language of Energy?

–Why Dowsing Works – Scientific Proof

–How To Program Your Pendulum

–How To Increase Your Accuracy Level of Dowsing

–How To Use a Pendulum The Right Way

–How To Ask Yes, No, and Maybe Questions

–When To Use And Not Use a Pendulum

–Dowsing Troubleshooting Scenarios – And What To Do About It

–How To Measure Energy Without Using a Pendulum

–Intuitive Kinesiology – How To Use Your Body To Measure Energy and Get Answers

–How To Ask Multiple Choice Questions – And Get Accurate Answers

–How To Formulate Questions – Including Leading & Incomplete Questions

–Countless Applications of Dowsing

–Quadruple Verification System – My Personal Tool!

************************************************************************

“I had an amazing healing during our session where I physically felt each body part as it was releasing old beliefs, toxins and trauma. The belief of unworthiness was removed that day and later that evening I experienced a major shift in my self confidence - for the first time I spoke up in a way that was empowering and I didn't feel scared, I felt worthy to be me.“

Sitaji, Maine

************************************************************************

Special note: This is a certification course. You have the option to receive a professional looking Basic Dowsing Certificate issued by Core Freedom Academy. This is ideal for those students who want to move on to the Advanced Dowsing course in order to use transcendental dowsing techniques to work with clients. In order to get your certificate with Core Freedom Academy, you will need to apply for it off-site. The certification is free but it does require you enter your legal name and email address so we can issue your certificate.

Enroll now and get lifetime access to this course and all future class modules.
title: Basic Dowsing and Muscle Testing Certification Course
